Trade/Device Name(s): LZI Oral Fluid Methamphetamine Enzyme Immunoassay
Homogeneous Oral Fluid Methamphetamine Enzyme Immunoassay
Specimen Container(s): LZI Oral Fluid Collector (50 mL polypropylene collection tube)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for LZI Oral Fluid Methamphetamine Enzyme Immunoassay and associated calibrators and controls for qualitative and semi-quantitative detection of d-methamphetamine in oral fluid using automated chemistry analyzers
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative and semi-quantitative determination of d-methamphetamine in neat human oral fluid collected with the LZI Oral Fluid Collector at a cutoff of 50 ng/mL, for prescription use with automated clinical chemistry analyzers
